description: Explore the comprehensive overview of Arbitrum's token distribution strategy, focusing on its design, governance, and implications for decentralized finance. Understand how Arbitrum utilizes rollup technology to enhance Ethereum's scalability while empowering its community through the ARB token.
keywords: Arbitrum, ARB token, decentralized finance, DeFi, Ethereum, layer-2 scaling, rollup technology, token distribution, governance, decentralized autonomous organization, Offchain Labs
title: Arbitrum Token Distribution: A Comprehensive Overview
